::Annihilator/Killer::

Annihilator stumbles into the clearing with Set's and Shuko's base, dragging 
Killer behind him.

The defences recognise him as he passes them, and do not open fire. He stops 
at the entrance. "Hoooney, I'm hoooooome..." He says, his eyes a bit 
unfocused before he falls down face first on the floor.
